channel.title: 508 problem :confused:
channel.description:
hi, i downloaded a 508 source the other day and went i go into the cmd folder there is alot of batch files.
when i click all.bat is says cannot find the path specified
what should i do ??? please help i really want to play on it.
thanks.

@J_K0_U wrote:

ok i did that but the when i click run.bat this comes up

java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:359) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:45) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:51) Press any key to continue . . .
please help

item.title: 508 problem :confused:
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Change it to this.

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause

item.title: 508 problem :confused:
item.dc:creator: @J_K0_U J K0 U
item.description:
@J_K0_U wrote:

this is the code that comes up when i right click all.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause

i have 1.6.0_07 should i change it to that in the all.bat file ?

thanks
